page.title: 20Credits for Evie survey
page.content: Our survey was the result of research and discussion between parents, children and school staff. This meant there was a considerable amount of community involvement and co-operation from all those concerned. Questionnaires which were made up and delivered by the children, were almost all answered and returned. We are indebted to Mrs Barbara Vesco who co-ordinated the study, Mrs Kathryn Sclater who programmed the entire survey and to Mr Bertie Baikie who supplied the slide photographs.
